scripts.posthtml_1: cd public && posthtml index.html -u posthtml-img-autosize -u posthtml-inline-assets -u htmlnano && node ../util/postprocess.js
scripts.posthtml_2: cd public/legal/ && posthtml index.html  -u posthtml-img-autosize -u posthtml-inline-assets -u htmlnano && node ../../util/postprocess.js
